pages.text: $(b)Resonant Armor$() is the pinnacle of magical protection. Each piece requires $(violet)Resonant Catalysts$() and is crafted at the $(#)Alchemy Table$().

pages.title: Resonant Helmet
pages.text: $(l)Resonant Helmet Recipe:$()$(br2)$(violet)Ingredients:$()$(br)• Silver Helmet$(br)• 2x Full Resonant Catalyst$(br)• Silver Template$(br)• Netherite Ingot$(br2)$(gold)Cost: 15 XP, 400 ticks$()

pages.title: Resonant Chestplate
pages.text: $(l)Resonant Chestplate Recipe:$()$(br2)$(violet)Ingredients:$()$(br)• Silver Chestplate$(br)• 2x Full Resonant Catalyst$(br)• Silver Template$(br)• Netherite Ingot$(br2)$(gold)Cost: 15 XP, 400 ticks$()

pages.title: Resonant Leggings
pages.text: $(l)Resonant Leggings Recipe:$()$(br2)$(violet)Ingredients:$()$(br)• Silver Leggings$(br)• 2x Full Resonant Catalyst$(br)• Silver Template$(br)• Netherite Ingot$(br2)$(gold)Cost: 15 XP, 400 ticks$()

pages.title: Resonant Boots
pages.text: $(l)Resonant Boots Recipe:$()$(br2)$(violet)Ingredients:$()$(br)• Silver Boots$(br)• 2x Full Resonant Catalyst$(br)• Silver Template$(br)• Netherite Ingot$(br2)$(gold)Cost: 15 XP, 400 ticks$()

pages.title: Full Set Bonus
pages.text: $(l)Complete Resonant Set:$()$(br2)The full set provides:$(br)• Magical protection$(br)• Special abilities$(br)• Enhanced durability$(br2)$(violet)The ultimate endgame armor!$()
